name: Untitled Ghost Game (Dubscr, paulinator342, Gomibako Studios)
name_original: Untitled Ghost Game (Dubscr, paulinator342, Gomibako Studios)
description:
A 2d ghost hunting game with 11 unique ghosts, 2 maps, and 8 items you can use to deduct what ghost you are dealing with. Be careful, or the ghost might get you

Basic tutorial on discord server: https://discord.gg/7pu3xbBU55
